response.overview: Mayu was a successful career woman. After falling in love with Isao, a college student who came to work for the company, he got married at the same time as Isao graduated from college and resigned from the company as he wished. I enjoyed the days when I was happy and pouring my passion into my work, but my life as a full-time housewife is not bad either. Her husband Isao, who had been suffering from job difficulties, finally got a job at a pharmaceutical company. I wanted to let go of the hour, but this becomes the prelude to a nightmare life. On the day of the new employee reception, the manager who drives Isao, who is drunk, to his house, pays attention to Mayu's beautiful appearance and decides to deceive the couple. The manager and Chief Aragaki deliberately make Isao make a mistake that causes a huge loss, and make him crazy about the compensation. Also, the manager uses this as an excuse to make Mayu his slave and abuse her. ...
response.title: Obscene Breeding Diary
